NODE.title: Help with Mini Nodelets
NODE.field:
Mini Nodelets

Setup

Nodelets with "mini" capaility ought to have a minimize icon appear in the upper right-hand corner. If the image is broken, you may need to manually insert the image (minime.gif) into the images directory in your web directory (public_html or htdocs most likely). This image is included in the in the core system nodeball.

New Mini Nodelets

New Mini nodelets can be created the same way as ordinary nodelets, but must contain the title "TITLE Mini" in order to work properly. You must then assign the corresponding full sized nodelet as this nodelet's "mini nodelet", and edit that nodelet to point to this newly created nodelet as its "mini nodelet."
